Los Angeles, California, United States
Summary
Possess MBA degree & currently pursuing Business Analytics in
USC. I am a business analytics professional with work experience in
the High Technology, Semiconductor and Pharmaceutical industry.
As a HR professional and manufacturing supervisor, which shows
the leadership, cross-functional teamwork and problem-solving skills.
With major background in business analytics field at USC Marshall,
I have the ability to leverage her business strategy insights with data
visualization skills and provide excellent solutions. Furthermore, my
passion is keeping learning and delivering good changes in the real
world.
Currently based in Los Angeles, my solid educational and
professional background points to a promising career development
within global Tech-oriented  companies, positioning me to play a
pivotal role in driving business analytics, strategies and innovations.
Experience

TSMC
Intelligent Manufacturing Engineer (Manufacturing Supervisor)
September 2014 - March 2017  (2 years 7 months)
Taiwan
1. Led 16-32 operators in TSMC manufacturing dept.
2. Improved productivity in effective and efficient way to meets the organization
objectives. 
3. Analyzed data using database systems/tools built and updating tracking
programs to keep operating smoothly. Scheduled work plans in order to meet
customer and business expectations. 
4. Prioritized and handled multiple projects with potentially overlapping
deadlines.
5. Managed Direct Labors (DL) and building a team spirit through involvement
and forum based communications.
6. Contributed ideas and suggestions to improve standard techniques,
protocols and processes. 
7. Co-worked with different functions such as Process Engineering dept. ,
Process Integrated Engineering dept. and Equipment Engineering dept. to
ensure robotic workstations, detection instruments, and database/informatics
tools are built to meet the demands on the service.
8. Operation management/training/project management/People management.
9. Problem-solving and provide analysis.
10. Oversaw the daily operations of IC foundry to ensure that all profiling
operations, work flow, and customer reports are consistent with agreed upon
service operations.
